startPage.title: Blend in or stand out - What's your strategy?
startPage.description: It's not about what is right, it's about what most people think. Let's get started!

learnMorePage.title: Learn more about Odd One Out!

modes.description: In this mode, the goal is to NOT be the odd one out. The challenge is to guess what others will pick—can you predict what they'll choose? You'll only score points if someone else thinks the same way. The player with the most points at the end wins!

In this mode, you WANT to be the odd one out! Your mission is to think differently from everyone else. You'll only score points if no one else picks the same answer as you. If someone else has the same idea, neither of you scores! It's all about standing out and thinking outside the box—dare to be different!
